name: JavaScript Block Widget
author: Debiprasad Sahoo

sections.description:
This is a very simple sidebar widget which places javascript code in the widget. You need to provide only the script (while editing the widget), this widget will place this code inside javascript blocks.

You can also able to add JavaScript codes in text widget in sidebar. So you don’t need this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Sidebar’ page and add this widget to your sidebar
  4. Edit the properties of the widget, provide header and js script (without <script> tags)
  5. Save the changes in the sidebar

short_description: Widget plugin to run any JavaScript in the sidebar
description:
This is a very simple sidebar widget which places javascript code in the widget. You need to provide only the script (while editing the widget), this widget will place this code inside javascript blocks.

You can also able to add JavaScript codes in text widget in sidebar. So you don’t need this plugin.
